name: RandomResponses
0:
”Alexa, open Random Response”
”Alexa, start Random Response”
”Alexa, launch Random Response”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: random response
des: Provides a random response based on responses provided by the computer in Robert A. Heinlein's novel "The Number of the Beast". The original statement to the computer to trigger the responses was "You're a smart girl"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
